game.title: The Golden Coffer of El Dorado
game.objective: Discover the wealth of El Dorado in an ancient pyramid.
game.description: A local shaman has revealed a map to the lost treasure of El Dorado. Your quest is to uncover this fortune and bring it back before time runs out.

task.description: Start by studying the shaman's map and gathering necessary supplies. You can either embark from Lima, Peru or Iquitos, Peru.
The pyramid is said to be hidden among the dense jungle. Search for signs of ancient structures or consult with local tribes for guidance.

task.objective: Enter and navigate the pyramid's inner chambers.
task.description: Beware of traps and guardian creatures as you uncover the treasure chamber. Your wits and courage will be key to your success.
